A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: George lucas had a premonition of what his beloved space saga would end up as when he named the famous smuggling ship the \"Millenial\" falcon\nThe last Jedi is a turd of a film marketed toward millenials who have no concept or appreciation of lore or history\nThis is by far the lamest and most disappointing entry in the Star Wars universe and is a travesty and an affront to any true Star Wars fan.  I left the theater feeling confus d\, disgusted\, and cheated.  A week later I'm still having very negative feelings about this experience and I will be watching the next installment on my computer with Korean subtitles because I surely will not be paying for it next time fool me once Kathleen!
